display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 2.生成图形验证码+UUID，以UUID为key，验证码值为value，保存至Redis，并设置TTL，然后响应UUID和验证码图片给前端

switch.text: 2.生成图形验证码+UUID，以UUID为key，验证码值为value，保存至Redis，并设置TT...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 31px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3.用户输入用户名、密码、验证码，然后将UUID一同发送给后端，请求登录

switch.text: 3.用户输入用户名、密码、验证码，然后将UUID一同发送给后端，请求登录

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 431px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 4.根据UUID从Redis中查询验证码，然后依次校验验证码、用户名和密码，若通过校验，则登录成功，生成JWT并响应给前端

switch.text: 4.根据UUID从Redis中查询验证码，然后依次校验验证码、用户名和密码，若通过校验，则登录成功，生成JWT并响应给前端

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 275px; margin-left: 31px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 7.验证JWT，若合法，则从数据库中查询用户信息，并响应给前端

switch.text: 7.验证JWT，若合法，则从数据库中查询用户信息，并响应给前端
